tasks.title: Review Upwork Paid Media candidates
tasks.notes: Review 5 shortlisted + full 43 proposals for Paid Media & Funnel Optimization Expert role. URGENT: No active ads management = declining leads.

tasks.title: Send screening messages to top Upwork candidates
tasks.notes: Send screening messages to top 5-7 candidates from review.

tasks.title: Paid Media contractor video interviews
tasks.notes: Schedule 20-min video calls with top 3-4 candidates (Feb 10-14). Daniel, Dwayne, or others may join.

tasks.title: Present Paid Media contractor recommendation
tasks.notes: Present hiring recommendation to Daniel and Dwayne. Role: $100-150/hr, 5-10 hrs/week, managing franchise + corporate ad accounts.

tasks.title: Meet Devaune Bohall (Culture and Care Leader)
tasks.notes: Culture and Care Leader. Leads corporate prayer, connection rhythms, birthday/anniversary recognition, hardship care. Key relationship for understanding team culture.

tasks.title: Meet Misti Herring
tasks.notes: Provided feedback that helped Daniel/Dwayne define and clarify office culture. Influential voice in the organization.

tasks.title: Meet Graham Baugh (Director of Process Improvement)
tasks.notes: FROM INTERVIEW: Daniel said 'I think you two would work really well together.' Graham handles process/structure fixes. Started ~90 days ago. Key operational partner.

tasks.title: Meet Brad Taylor (Chief Development Officer)
tasks.notes: FROM INTERVIEW: Leads franchise sales. Highest title authority on franchise side. Reports: Jeff Stokes, Craig Bohall.

tasks.title: Secret shop 3-5 franchise locations
tasks.notes: FROM 90-DAY PLAN: Full secret shop 3-5 locations. Pre-start baseline in pre-secret-shop task. Continue post-start for additional data.

tasks.title: Audit ad accounts and CRM data quality
tasks.notes: FROM 90-DAY PLAN: Categorize data as Gold (trustworthy), Silver (trend-based), or Bronze (broken). No delegation - need to know personally.

tasks.title: Determine paid ads partner solution
tasks.notes: FROM INTERVIEW: Options - rehire agency, bring in-house, or manage personally. Previous agency fired for poor management. If seat empty, Alex manages spend in 'safe mode' until filled.

tasks.title: Review and fix org chart
tasks.notes: FROM INTERVIEW: Daniel said 'It would be amazing if you could just hand over our messy document and you can just fix it.' Titles don't make sense - executives ranked higher than chiefs. Daniel hates org charts.

tasks.title: Lock funnel definitions (lead, show, close)
tasks.notes: FROM 90-DAY PLAN: Day 1 kickoff. Align definitions so scorecard isn't a debate. What counts as a lead? Show? Close?

tasks.title: Virtual meeting with CEO Daniel Stein
tasks.notes: BUCKET 1: Culture & Company Orientation. Understand leadership expectations and performance standards.

tasks.title: Complete all online new hire training
tasks.notes: BUCKET 1: Culture & Company Orientation. Required for onboarding completion.

tasks.title: Review accountability chart and seat ownership
tasks.notes: BUCKET 1: Culture & Company Orientation. Understand org structure.

tasks.title: Memorize core values, mission, vision, North Star
tasks.notes: BUCKET 1: Completion standard - must clearly articulate all four.

tasks.title: Meeting with Ov Mahboob - review handover document
tasks.notes: BUCKET 2: Tech Training. Outgoing VP handover. Critical context transfer. SCHEDULE THIS WEEK.

tasks.title: Google email and calendar setup (Naovi Flores)
tasks.notes: BUCKET 2: Tech Training. Naovi Flores handles setup.

tasks.title: Strong Growth Platform setup & training (Judah)
tasks.notes: BUCKET 2: Tech Training. Judah Stoltzfus. Reporting dashboards.

tasks.title: Fathom AI Notetaker setup (Naovi)
tasks.notes: BUCKET 2: Tech Training. Meeting transcription tool.

tasks.title: Dropbox file structure and permissions (Naovi)
tasks.notes: BUCKET 2: Tech Training. Verify access to all files.

tasks.title: ActiveCampaign training (CRM, email, SMS, automations)
tasks.notes: BUCKET 2: Tech Training. Naovi Flores. Core CRM platform.

tasks.title: Glofox training (athlete scheduling, waivers, trials)
tasks.notes: BUCKET 2: Tech Training. Naovi Flores. Athlete management.

tasks.title: JustCall training (calling and SMS workflows)
tasks.notes: BUCKET 2: Tech Training. Naovi Flores. Setter team communication.

tasks.title: GA4 access and campaign tracking overview (Naovi)
tasks.notes: BUCKET 2: Tech Training. Analytics and attribution.

tasks.title: Zapier integrations and automation logic review (Naovi)
tasks.notes: BUCKET 2: Tech Training. System integrations.

tasks.title: Social media and ad platform access verified (Naovi)
tasks.notes: BUCKET 2: Tech Training. Meta, Google, YouTube, LinkedIn.

tasks.title: Planning session with Graham Baugh - athlete sales
tasks.notes: BUCKET 3: Plan Ready for Day 1. Director of Process Improvement.

tasks.title: Planning session with Judah Stoltzfus - attribution/tracking
tasks.notes: BUCKET 3: Plan Ready for Day 1. Attribution and tracking systems.

tasks.title: Paid ads campaign review with fractional ads team
tasks.notes: BUCKET 3: Plan Ready for Day 1. Current campaign status and performance.

tasks.title: Update and finalize 90-day plan
tasks.notes: BUCKET 3: Completion standard - plan loaded into SGP, ready for Day 1 execution.

tasks.title: $5,000 signing bonus - completion gate
tasks.notes: COMPLETION: All onboarding buckets complete. Bonus released at start.

tasks.title: Send follow-up email to Dwayne (sequencing recommendation)
tasks.notes: Recommend: hire first, build together. Individual accounts + Meta forms = 3x CPL improvement.

tasks.title: Request core values/mission/vision doc from Daniel
tasks.notes: Required for onb-04 (memorize and articulate). Cannot complete that task without this.

tasks.title: Get clarification on Michael role/status
tasks.notes: Open question from analysis email. Who is he? Using Julia Siwert email. Being replaced or supplemented?

tasks.title: Request SOPs/playbooks from Ov
tasks.notes: From handover doc: Athlete Lead SOP, GO Playbook, Setter workflows, Marketing Playbook. Get during Ov meeting.

tasks.title: Confirm Naovi bandwidth for training schedule
tasks.notes: She owns 10+ setup/training items. Confirm she has capacity and agree on schedule.

tasks.title: Secret shop 2-3 franchise locations (pre-start baseline)
tasks.notes: Submit leads, track response time. Feel the friction. Baseline data before Day 1. Full secret shop (interview-03) continues post-start.

tasks.title: Setup 1:1 cadence with direct reports
tasks.notes: Set up recurring 1:1 meetings with Madelyn Incomio (Social Media), Kyla Hora (Admin), and Josh Campos (SEO). They've been submitting weekly reports pre-start; now establish regular cadence.

tasks.title: Follow up Graham documents
